title: Frame Magazine #101 didot-like font ?
content:
screenshot from cover

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317201720im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1_4498.png)

extract from page title

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317201720im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2_5055.png)

extract from page title

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317201720im_/http:/typophile.com/files/3_4663.png)

Though the "g" and "y" are very unique, WhatTheFont and WhatFontIs couldn't recognize this font.  
And I searched the previous FontID posts with "Frame Magazine" keyword but in vain.  
If anybody knows the font name, please let me know. Thanks.

Best Regards,  
Chien

Font: 

 Swiss Typefaces/NewParis KingSize Air
